https://tmrev.io/movie/625545-Apapacho: A Caress for the Soul 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/i8CEsPrlY9vSX1nBBREMxc18tBm.jpg While away in Mexico, Karine and Estelle witness the preparation and rejoicing of the “Day of the Dead”. Inspired by the beauty of the ritual and the fine spiritual humor of their hosts, they will soon learn to see their sister’s recent tragic death in a more light-hearted manner. Apapacho: A Caress for the Soul
